attachmentHtml:
PC Number: 2016-0703

Date: 2016-07-29

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

His Excellency the Governor General in Council, on the recommendation of the Prime Minister, fixes the remuneration, in the amount and on the date indicated in the annexed schedule, of:

 

Ballantyne, Meena, Coordinator, Office of the Coordinator, Status of Women, within the range ($196,600 - $230,200), effective April 1, 2016;

 

Beaudet, Alain, President, Canadian Institutes of Health Research, within the range GC 10 ($259,900 - $305,700), effective April 1, 2016;

 

Beaudet, André, former Secretary, National Battlefields Commission, within the range GC 3 ($98,100 - $115,300), commencing on April 1, 2015 and ending December 23, 2015;

 

Berthiaume, Guy, Librarian and Archivist of Canada, within the range GC 8 ($196,600 - $231,200), effective April 1, 2016;

 

Bosc, Marc, acting Clerk of the House of Commons, within the range GC 8 ($196,600 - $231,200), effective April 1, 2016;

 

Cossette, Gérald, Director, Financial Transactions and Reports Analysis Centre of Canada, within the range GC 8 ($196,600 - $231,200), effective April 1, 2016;

 

Donoghue, Christine, acting President, Public Service Commission, within the range ($192,600 - $226,500), effective April 1, 2016;

 

Dufresne, Philippe, Law Clerk and Parliamentary Counsel, House of Commons, within the range ($171,200 - $200,300), effective April 1, 2016;

 

 

 

 

…/2


- 2 -

Joli-Coeur, Claude, Government Film Commissioner, National Film Board, within the range GC 8 ($196,600 - $231,200), effective April 1, 2016;

 

Kowal, Harry James, Principal, Royal Military College of Canada, within the range GC 7 ($171,200 - $201,300), effective April 1, 2016;

 

Laporte, Sylvain, President, Canadian Space Agency, within the range GC 8 ($196,600 - $231,200), effective April 1, 2016;

 

Latourelle, Alan, former Chief Executive Officer, Parks Canada Agency, within the range ($192,600 - $226,500), commencing on April 1, 2015 and ending August 6, 2015;

 

Lawson, Thomas J., former Chief of the Defence Staff, within the range ($247,900 - $291,600), commencing on April 1, 2015 and ending July 16, 2015;

 

L’Heureux, Sonia, Parliamentary Librarian, within the range GC 7 ($171,200 - $201,300), effective April 1, 2016;

 

MacLeod, Kevin S., Canadian Secretary to The Queen, within the range ($148,900 - $175,100), effective April 1, 2016;

 

McArdle, André, Secretary, Canadian Intergovernmental Conference Secretariat, within the range GC 4 ($112,600 - $132,400), effective April 1, 2016;

 

 

 

…/3


- 3 -

 

 

 

Notarandrea, Rita, Chief Executive Officer, Canadian Centre on Substance Abuse, within the range ($148,900 - $174,100), effective April 1, 2016;

 

Peters, John Gregory, Usher of the Black Rod, within the range GC 3 ($98,100 - $115,300), effective April 1, 2016;

 

Pinto, B. Mario, President, Natural Sciences and Engineering Research Council, within the range GC 9 ($226,100 - $266,000), effective April 1, 2016;

 

Robert, Charles, interim Clerk of the Senate and Clerk of the Parliaments, within the range GC 6 ($148,900 - $175,100), effective April 1, 2016;

 

Rooney, Jane, Financial Literacy Leader, Financial Consumer Agency of Canada, within the range GC 5 ($129,500 - $152,300), effective April 1, 2016;

 

Scott, David, President, Canadian High Arctic Research Station, within the range GC 6 ($148,900 - $175,100), effective April 1, 2016;

 

Taylor, Gregory, Chief Public Health Officer of Canada, Public Health Agency of Canada, within the range ($226,100 - $265,000), effective April 1, 2016;

 

Vance, Jonathan H., Chief of the Defence Staff, within the range ($221,300 - $260,300), effective April 1, 2016;

 

Wallace, Stephen, Secretary to the Governor General, within the range ($192,600 - $226,500), effective April 1, 2016; and

 

Watson, Daniel, Chief Executive Officer, Parks Canada Agency, within the range ($221,300 - $260,300), effective April 1, 2016.

 

 


 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

Sur recommandation du premier ministre, Son Excellence le Gouverneur général en conseil fixe la rémunération, conformément au montant et à la date indiquée dans l’annexe ci-jointe, de :

 

Ballantyne, Meena, coordonnatrice, Bureau de la coordonnatrice de la situation de la femme, dans l’échelle (196 600 $ - 230 200 $), à compter du 1er avril 2016;

 

Beaudet, Alain, président, Instituts de recherche en santé du Canada, dans l’échelle GC 10 (259 900 $ - 305 700 $), à compter du 1er avril 2016;

 

Beaudet, André, ancien secrétaire, Commission des champs de bataille nationaux, dans l’échelle GC 3 (98 100 $ - 115 300 $), commençant le 1er avril 2015 et se terminant le 23 décembre 2015;

 

Berthiaume, Guy, bibliothécaire et archiviste du Canada, dans l’échelle GC 8 (196 600 $ - 231 200 $), à compter du 1er avril 2016;

 

Bosc, Marc, greffier intérimaire de la Chambre des communes, dans l’échelle GC 8 (196 600 $ - 231 200 $), à compter du 1er avril 2016;

 

Cossette, Gérald, directeur, Centre d’analyse des opérations et déclarations financières du Canada, dans l’échelle GC 8 (196 600 $ - 231 200 $), à compter du 1er avril 2016;

 

Donoghue, Christine, présidente intérimaire, Commission de la fonction publique, dans l’échelle (192 600 $ - 226 500 $), à compter du 1er avril 2016;

 

Dufresne, Philippe, secrétaire légiste et conseiller parlementaire, Chambre des communes, dans l’échelle (171 200 $ - 200 300 $), à compter du 1er avril 2016;
